l10n.microphoneNotSupported: Microphone not supported. Make sure you are using a browser that allows microphone recording.
l10n.microphoneInaccessible: Microphone is not accessible. Make sure that the browser microphone is enabled.
l10n.insecureNotAllowed: Access to microphone is not allowed in your browser since this page is not served using HTTPS. Please contact the author, and ask him to make this available using HTTPS
l10n.statusReadyToRecord: Press a button below to record your answer.
l10n.statusPaused: Recording paused. Press a button to continue recording.
l10n.statusFinishedRecording: You have successfully recorded your answer! Listen to the recording below.
l10n.retryDialogBodyText: By pressing "Retry" you will lose your current recording.

title:
Machine translation may be a shortcut to languages you do not know (yet). Try it out for unknown languages!

Open an audio translator and use this audio recorder to hear yourself talking in different languages. For instance, say HELLO in Finnish, Dutch, Greek and Italian!
